statements: DELETE FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE payment_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE bill_id = 100 AND payment_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM TelehealthBillingData WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe' AND service_cost > 500.00;
DELETE FROM telehealth_billing_data WHERE patient_id = 100 AND payment_status = 'UNPAID';
DELETE FROM telehealth_payment_data WHERE payment_id = 500 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM telehealth_billing WHERE patient_id = 123 AND service_date <= '2021-01-31';
